## 🚀 Getting you started with some basic info...

form.label: Customer Name
form.helpText: Whats the name of the customer? Will be shown in the error email.

form.label: Automation name
form.helpText: Whats do you want the automation to be called?

form.label: Select Reload Options
form.helpText:
🔄 Chain Reloader: Installs a automation for reloads in a predefined sequence.{linebreak}
📊 Monitoring: Monitors the schedule reloads of specified applications.{linebreak}

form.label: Extract space
form.helpText: Choose the space where your extract applications are located

form.label: Extract Applications:
form.helpText: ⚠️ **Note:** The order in which you select applications matters. The applications you check first will be first in line to be loaded. If you uncheck and check again, that application will go back to the end of the queue.

form.label: Transform space
form.helpText: Choose the space where your transform applications are located

form.label: Transform Applications:
form.helpText: ⚠️ **Note:** The order in which you select applications matters. The applications you check first will be first in line to be loaded. If you uncheck and check again, that application will go back to the end of the queue.

form.label: Load space
form.helpText: Choose the space where your Load applications are located

form.label: Load Applications:
form.helpText: ⚠️ **Note:** The order in which you select applications matters. The applications you check first will be first in line to be loaded. If you uncheck and check again, that application will go back to the end of the queue.

form.label: How often should the automation run?
form.helpText:
Choose how often the
automation should run.
form.values: 15 minutes, 30 minutes, Hour, 4 Hours,12 Hours, Day, 2 Days, Week

form.label: At what time should the automation start?
Email
form.helpText: Where should notification email be sent if automation fails?

form.label: Description
form.helpText: Should the automation have a description?

form.label: Should Automation only run on weekdays?
form.helpText: If yes, automation will not run on Saturday or Sunday.

blocks.comment: Should the Developer role be auto-applied?

form.label: Should this installer add the Developer role to the executing user now?
form.helpText: The executing user ({$.getUser.name}) does not have the Developer role assigned, which is one of the prerequisites for the Qlik Cloud monitoring applications. This role is required to proceed as API keys are required for the data connection, and in order to create an API key, the Developer role is required. If 'No' is selected, this step will need to be done manually and the installer will exit. Note that the installer will still stop after this step regardless as it is required that the user log out and log back in for the role change to propagate in Qlik Application Automation.
